title: Rich Shortcrust Pastry

ingredients.content: 120 g unsalted butter, diced (1 cm) then frozen for 30 minutes

preparations.content: Place butter, flour, icing sugar, salt, egg yolk and water in mixing bowl then mix <b>30 sec/speed 4<b>. Tip out and bring together into a ball then wrap in cling film and refrigerate for 20 minutes. Use as required to line tart tin (see tip).

hintsAndTricks: Roll out pastry between two sheets of baking paper or cling film to desired thickness and press into tin. Return tin to fridge while making filling.
This recipe makes enough pastry to line a Ø 28 cm tart tin.
To blind bake, line pastry shell with baking paper then fill with baking beans before baking as per timings and temperature on recipe.
